name: LABRATORY TESTS
about: Laboratory tests check a sample of your blood, urine, or body tissues. A technician or your doctor analyzes the test samples to see if your results fall within the normal range.

name: HEALTH LIFESTYLE
about: Discover your best self through daily tips, quotes and new articles posted weekly. Smart Strategies for Successful Living provides great health & wellness tips. See Resources. Donate Online.

name: ARYTHMIA TREATMENT
about: Treatment for heart arrhythmias may include medications, therapies such as vagal maneuvers, cardioversion, catheter procedures or heart surgery its li healthy lifestyle.

name: ECG TESTS
about: An electrocardiogram (ECG) is a simple test that can be used to check your heart's rhythm and electrical activity. Sensors attached to the skin are used to detect the electrical signals.

name: PHYSICAL EXAMINATION
about: A physical examination is a routine test your primary care provider (PCP) performs to check your overall health. A PCP may be a doctor, a nurse practitioner, or a physician assistant.
